locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Of course a great place to shower andfrriendly hospitality thanks to Shelly.  You've also got to try Hardee's restaurant. Great service big beefy burgers but you gotta ask John to cut it in half cause you won't be able to pick it upi. Yum ‚Ä¶

Been driving cross country in the sex dungeon for 7 years, Loves is the truck stop of choice to grab a shower and coffee before I hit the hwy with scraps and review more Google favorites.  I love my job, Pilates and Paula üòçüòçüòç ‚Ä¶

First of all they have No Laundry
Went in to get shower, no towels. Good thing I caught it and went outside to ask for towels. They had no washcloths. Overall no bueno
Great truck stop. Nice employee's. The truck shop has very educated diesel repair tech's employed here. Plenty of shower's and it is a really clean parking lot.

We stopped for a quick shower between stops. Showers we're large & emaculate. They gave us extra towels with his and hers signs on them for us. Cute touch for a truck stop. Place was very clean for as busy as it was on a rainy day. Great ‚Ä¶

Worst place to be at .. especially the lady as their manager I guess . I have a picture of my Barcode for loves just to get a shower . Which I did a day before and today she gonna tell me they don‚Äôt allow that ?? Since when she was being ‚Ä¶

I wish they clean shower here. A driver just comes out of the shower and she hands me towels. When did love‚Äôs stop cleaning showers? I am definitely not gonna eat here. Who knows what else they don‚Äôt clean. With Covid going around, I ‚Ä¶
Very friendly staff. Clean hot shower. Clean organized store.  Hardee's has excellent customer service and fresh food. Ample truck parking. Great stop for everybody.

üåüüåüüåüüåüCLEAN SHOWERSüåüüåüüåüüåü
A clean hot shower is everything when you're on the road.... The store was clean also... Staff was ok.... There's a Hardee's inside and its clean as well..... Decent amount of parking.... Clean well kept lot also ‚Ä¶
Waited so long for shower. The estimated time was 30-45 minutes but it took more than 2 hours.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice and clean location. Decent amount of truck parking seems to be a lot creative parking over here. They got to shop some friendly staff. Storage clean on the inside and outside. Showers were nice and hot with good water flow. Friendly staff would stop here again.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

Its the majority of the employees that make this place completely awful. Its too bad because I love Love's! The selection and the bathrooms cant be beat. The manager is just a hateful woman who is rude to everyone including the employees. ‚Ä¶
Good showers, friendly service, John the operation manager is friendly and take care of me well.

Of course a great place to shower andfrriendly hospitality thanks to Shelly.  You've also got to try Hardee's restaurant. Great service big beefy burgers but you gotta ask John to cut it in half cause you won't be able to pick it upi. Yum Yum!

Love‚Äôs

Always good. Clean. Good service. ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
This is not too bad for a Flying J. The store is clean, well maintained and stocked.
üõéÔ∏è The store staff was very professional and friendly which is always great. ‚Ä¶

Everyone was nice and friendly. The young man who was turning over the showers seem to be doing a really good job. He was one of the first I've seen that was spraying and like hard scrubbing / mopping the floor. The only concern is shower sevens security.
Excellent, hot showers, I don't like they way the pump are designed. Too complicated.
Quite a good Pilot, spacious parking, many showers, quite clean. The staff is polite, the retail premises are kept in good condition and clean.

Baby changing table was disgusting. Full of crumbs, hair, dirty shoe prints, and the disposable paper liners were out. We chose to stop here because as a travel center we thought there would be a clean and stocked place to change our baby. Wipe the tables down and order more liners.

locations.title: 29 Pines Travel PIaza
locations.content: 29 Pines Travel PIaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Going to tell my boss that he can send me here anytime. Restaurant very reasonable prices great wait staff very friendly. Got a shower average price $15.00 again great staff offered me everything I needed. Very clean. Will definitely tell others about you
Great place to do  34HRS RESET Clean parking lot, clean restrooms, laundry room, hair salon, hote, restaurant, .If you want peace and quiet 34HRS RESET this is the truck stop. 08/05/25

I wish I could remember the gals name, I wanna say Linda but I just don‚Äôt remember ! It was NYE, and I stopped by the travel plaza on my way across town. I used the restroom, and FORGOT my purse with all of my Christmas gift cards and cash ‚Ä¶
Nice and quite parked for the night plenty of space for truck parking and the store is open 24. Not plant options late night but still options for some type of food and restroom.
Excellent array of choices for food. Friendly staff. We made this our new stopping place when traveling through the area. Very clean store, restaurant and restrooms.
Always clean restrooms and many snack and drink options for travelers

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Quick stop while traveling through Wisconsin. The Osseo Family Restaurant that‚Äôs connected looked pretty good. Prices looked reasonable. Restrooms were clean. Didn‚Äôt need a shower, but what a great amenity for truck drivers and travelers.

Very nice shower facilities.  If I had to guess, I'd say the showers received a recent face-lift. Very clean and smelled good too. There were paper towels in the shower room! They also provided 2 bath-sized towels, 1 hand towel,  1 ‚Ä¶

The convenience store was nice and clean. Showers were a different story. Human waste streaks in the toilet. Curly hairs on the shower seat and the toilet lid. Hair dryer didn't work, even after resetting the ground fault. The shower door ‚Ä¶

Staff is top tier, shower freshly remodeled, and CLEAN. Food is also good. They have a good variety of snacks and fresh fruit bowls that were FRESH. It‚Äôs hard to come by a good helpful staff, and clean establishment out here in the truck ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ nothing to them at all. It is totally sad. Thank God I received a little money to take a shower and sustain it until tomorrow. Truckers and people in general in this area are not what you truly think they are!!!! A place to stay away from! ‚Ä¶
Very clean place,great stuff in the store,family restaurant(very very delicious food )big parking for semi clean shower.A+++++

‚Ä¶ Amazing home cooked food in the restaurant! Clean restrooms and I'm sure showers are nice too although we didn't use them.  Plenty of semi parking although the lot is not paved and has some potholes.  We will definitely be coming back! ‚Ä¶
Great place to stop! Friendly staff and clean facility. The food and the staff at the sit down restaurant were great. Great place for truckers to stop for a bathroom break, shower or a hot meal!
Amazing food in the restaurant! Pretty cool truck stop nice and tidy restrooms. The shower definitely needs a better cleaning procedure but wasn't "really" bad.
Store was clean and had lots of options for snacks. Shower was outdated but decently clean. The restaurant attached was good, food was great and the atmosphere was nice.

locations.title: Hixton Travel Plaza
locations.content: Hixton Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped for a 10 and shower. $8 for a shower. Water pressure was amazing. The 3 squares on the back are their own separate sprayers. 9/10. My only complaint is not having a fan in there for circulation. Shower 3 was clean. ‚Ä¶
This place is EXCELLENT!! Great customer service,  probably the best I've had in a long time. I took a shower there also & it was very clean.

‚Ä¶ . So was the Rum Raisin ice cream. I was offered a sample of all 8 flavors available at the time. Showers are $12. The shower I had, #4, was clean, has a bit of a view & has 3 streams in the shower that are controlled separately. It ‚Ä¶
Clean shower, and only 10 bucks! Friendly place and plenty of truck parking.  Great food!

This is a very clean truck stop. The toilets and showers are great. The showers are $8. You can experience a more luxurious shower than at major truck stops. The food at the restaurant next door was very delicious and the portions were more ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ do stop and have a look-see here. They have showers upstairs if you need a shower that have all the nozzles in the wall that is like a standing massage and it is Heavenly I'm telling you. The food is really really phenomenal and it's real ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ due to weather. We finally ordered breakfast and it was wonderful. Later that day we took showers, and OMG,best shower we have had on the road. After breakfast and showers we figured dinner was a good idea and it was!! I had a bacon ‚Ä¶
Best shower in the world. Seriously the best I've ever had. Had Polish Sausage and Sauerkraut special last night was very tasty and all I could eat. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the top of the Best truck stops across Great America. From the friendly personal at the fuel desk to the family style restaurant with great cooking...... and the showers are the BEST. Rather you just need fuel, eat or quick shower this is ‚Ä¶
Great diesel price for the state... 4/20/22 4.68/gal. Very trucker friendly also free shower plus beverage (50 gal min?) and 2 cent per gallon in store reward no card needed
